analyzed: @#/_/dpal mchog tu gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid bde ba chen po'i go 'phang rdo rje zhes

original: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/
analyzed: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/

analyzed: la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan dpa' bo che/_/bdag byin rlab pa'i

analyzed: pa bshad par bya/_/snying ka'i nang son zla ba la/_/zla ba'i gzugs nyid mi

analyzed: shigs pa/_/'od zer sna tshhogs kun tu 'phro/_/de las rdo rje rnam par bsgom/_/

analyzed: 'di yis bskul na ni/_/sna'i mthar gnas yungs kar la/_/mkha' 'gro ma
translated: at the end of the nose, the size of a mustard seed.🔽The continuum of migrating beings,

analyzed: rnams bsgom par bya/_/khams gsum brtan dang g.yo ba'i/_/'gro ba'i rgyud

analyzed: ni yungs kar rnams/_/de ltar bsgom par gyur pa ni/_/rang byin brlab par

analyzed: he ru ka'i rang bzhin/_/rnam med ma yin 'khor dang bcas/_/rang nyid he

analyzed: ru ka dpal mgon/_/bdag nyid kyang ni rig pa med/_/'das dang ma byung

analyzed: da ltar byung /_/thams cad de tshhe rig par 'gyur/_/rang nyid kun mkhyen

analyzed: bzhin du mthong /_/de bzhin du ni sangs rgyas mthong /_/yan lag kun gyi bu

analyzed: skad cig dgyes rdor rang bzhin 'dzin/_/ji ltar dmigs med nam ka bzhin/_/

analyzed: mtshhan ma med cing skye ba med/_/gos pa med cing rnam rtog med/_/sgrib pa lnga

analyzed: shes pa yis spangs/_/de bzhin bdag nyid he ru ka'i/_/rnam par gsal bar

translated: Chang said, It is neither true nor false.🔽It is neither to be accepted nor rejected.🔽 The bodhisattva said, What is the nature of that wisdom?🔽 Chang said, It is neither true nor false.

translated: It is neither to be accepted nor rejected.🔽 The bodhisattva said, What is the nature of that wisdom?🔽 Chang said, It is neither true nor false.🔽It is neither to be accepted nor rejected.🔽 The bodhisattva said, What is the nature of that wisdom?🔽 Chang said, It is neither true nor false.🔽It is neither to be accepted nor rejected.

translated: The bodhisattva said, What is the nature

analyzed: sems dpa' chen po he ru kar/_/bdag med lhan cig kha sbyor nga /_/nga ni
translated: I am the union of the great being Heruka and Nairatmya.

original: bems min bde chen pas/_/'jig rten ngo na bems po nga /_/bud med skyes
analyzed: bems min bde chen pas/_/'jig rten ngo na bems po nga /_/bud med skyes
translated: I am not matter, but great bliss, and so in the world I appear as matter,🔽just as I appear as a woman, a man, or a neuter.

original: min ma ning bzhin/_/nga yis 'gro ba 'di dag khyab/_/de lta bas na 'dus
analyzed: min ma ning bzhin/_/nga yis 'gro ba 'di dag khyab/_/de lta bas na 'dus
translated: I pervade all these beings, and so I am taught in the Guhyasamaja🔽Tantra. I have revealed myself as an ocean of victorious ones,

original: par bshad/_/nga yis rgyal ba rgya mtshhor bstan/_/sangs rgyas byang sems rdo rje
analyzed: par bshad/_/nga yis rgyal ba rgya mtshhor bstan/_/sangs rgyas byang sems rdo rje
translated: as buddhas, bodhisattvas, and vajra holders,🔽and as a neuter.

original: can/_/ma ning go 'phang du ni grub/_/lha mo ma ma ki gang de/_/btshun mo'i
analyzed: can/_/ma ning go 'phang du ni grub/_/lha mo ma ma ki gang de/_/btshun mo'i
translated: The goddess Mamaki is not of the nature of the night,🔽and I, Buddha Heruka, am not a man.

original: rang bzhin ma yin te/_/sangs rgyas he ru ka nga min/_/des na nga ni ma ning
analyzed: rang bzhin ma yin te/_/sangs rgyas he ru ka nga min/_/des na nga ni ma ning

original: yin/_/'gro bas dngos po gnyis su mthong /_/thabs dang shes rab rang
analyzed: yin/_/'gro bas dngos po gnyis su mthong /_/thabs dang shes rab rang

analyzed: bzhin nga /_/shin tu kha sbyar rnal 'byor gyis/_/mi bskyod pa min ma ma min/_/
translated: Through the yoga of union, I am not Akshobhya, nor am I Mamaki.

original: dpal mchog tu gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid bde ba chen po'i go 'phang rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
analyzed: dpal mchog tu gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid bde ba chen po'i go 'phang rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
translated: The nature of the supreme glory is the state of great bliss, which is called the vajra.

original: ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so//_//
translated: The Concentration is finished.

original: slob dpon rta mchog zhabs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa//_//
analyzed: slob dpon rta mchog zhabs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa//_//
translated: By the master Aśvaghoṣa.
